short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect the telegram ads advertising account to the Adstat Digital platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The primary function of this extension is to automate the process of connecting Telegram's advertising account to the Adstat Digital platform. It streamlines the setup, making it quick and effortless for users to link their Telegram ads account with Adstat Digital without manual steps.

Additionally, the extension automatically logs in users if the Adstat Digital website is open, providing a seamless and efficient user experience. This ensures that users have immediate access to the platform and can start managing their advertising activities without delays.
